Why is the Flag Flying at Half-Staff?

div.h3: Helpful Resources for our Commack Community

div.style: overflow-wrap: break-word; color: #000000; font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; padding-bottom: 15px

span.style: overflow-wrap: break-word; font-size: 16pt; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif

div.style: overflow-wrap: break-word; color: #000000; font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif
overflow-wrap: break-word; color: #000000; font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

span.style: overflow-wrap: break-word; color: #222222; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif
overflow-wrap: break-word; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; border: 1pt none windowtext; padding: 0in

p.span: In light of the fluid nature of the information we are receiving about Coronavirus, further adjustments may be necessary going forward and we will communicate them to you as soon as practical.

a.onclick: ga('send', 'event', 'PDF', 'Download', 'Regents Examination and Graduation Requirements FAQs');

li.a: Regents Examination and Graduation Requirements FAQs

a.onclick: ga('send', 'event', 'PDF', 'Download', 'NYS Education Dept. Cancels the June 2020 Regents');

li.a: NYS Education Dept. Cancels the June 2020 Regents

span.br: Students who, during the June 2020 examination period would have taken one or more Regents examinations, will be exempted from passing the assessments in order to be issued a diploma.

div.h3: Grab and Go Meal Delivery and Pick Up

span.span: Expanded Breakfast & Lunch Grab and Go and Delivery for Commack Students

div.style: overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #ffffff
overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #ffffff

span.style: overflow-wrap: break-word; color: #222222; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif

p.style: overflow-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; line-height: 18pt; background-image: initial; background-size: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial

span.p: The Commack School District's Grab and Go serves breakfast and lunch to our students. In addition, we applied and received approval from New York State to also provide meals for Saturdays and Sundays. In other words, we will be able to provide two meals every day, seven days a week. Delivery is also available. Click here for the information and bus routes.

p.style: overflow-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; line-height: 18pt; background-image: initial; background-size: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial

overflow-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; line-height: 18pt; background-image: initial; background-size: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial

span.p: Our Grab and Go program will continue Monday through Friday at Commack High School from 10 a.m. to noon. On Fridays, families will receive lunch for three days (Friday, Saturday and Sunday) AND breakfast for Saturday, Sunday AND Monday.

p.style: overflow-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; line-height: 18pt; background-image: initial; background-size: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial

span.p: Thank you to NYS for the increase in services to our families and to Whitsons Culinary Group for ramping up the meal service program to do so. Please encourage Commack families to participate in this food service program. FAQs

Directions to Commack Schools

div.span: The Commack School District Mission Statement
div.br:
Within the context of a caring community of learners, our primary mission is to provide an exemplary
learning experience that will allow each child to acquire the necessary knowledge, skills, attitudes, and
values to become a successful, contributing member within our school community and greater society.
